src:
KK Partizan ostao bez planiranog pojačanja!
06 Nov 2019, 20:10 by Milos
Ništa od novog pojačanja za KK Partizan.
Naime, kako saznaje „Sportando“, Džejms Bel nije prošao lekarske preglede i neće potpisati ugovor sa crno-belima.



Košarkaš iz SAD je u Evropi nastupao za Kremonu, Nansi, Hapoel Holon, Darušafaku, Cedevitu i Budućnost.
Ubrzo se oglasio i Partizan, koji je potvrdio ovu vest:
– Američki bek, Dzejms Bel neće pojačati redove crno-belih! Nekadašnji košarkaš Darušafake, Cedevite i Budućnosti, nije prošao sve potrebne lekarske preglede medicinskog konzilijuma KK Partizan NIS, koji se opredelio da sa njim, u ovom trenutku, ne potpisuje ugovor, pošto je igrač na spoljnoj poziciji crno-belima potreban odmah.
KK Partizan NIS želi Belu uspešan i brz oporavak uz nadu da će u uskoro ponovo moći da igra košarku na profesionalnom nivou, stoji na sajtu KK Partizan.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
BC Partizan left without planned reinforcement!
06 Nov 2019, 19:10 by Milos
None of the new reinforcements for BC Partizan.
Namely, according to Sportando, James Bell has not undergone medical examinations and will not sign a contract with black and whites.



Basketball player from the USA has played in Europe for Cremona, Nancy, Hapoel Holon, Darushafak, Cedevita and Future.
Partizan soon came forward, confirming this news:
- American back, James Bell will not step up black and white! The former Darushafaka, Cedevita and Buducnost basketball player did not pass all the necessary medical examinations of the BC Partizan NIS medical consultant, who decided not to sign a contract with him at this time, since the player in the outside position is needed immediately by black and whites.
BC Partizan NIS wishes Bella a successful and speedy recovery with the hope that she will soon be able to play basketball again at a professional level, according to BC Partizan website.
